short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a Google Calendar event by simply highlighting text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never hand-type a calendar event from an email or webpage again. HelloChrono uses AI to extract the title, time, date, location, and details of an event and opens a newly-created Google Calendar event in a new tab. It even handle tricky recurring or relative dates like "We meet every other Friday" or "Let's grab coffee in three days". 

Just highlight, right click, and choose "Create a Calendar Event" to have your event in seconds.
